head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KELLER, DANIEL SCHUBB

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KELLER, DANIEL SCHUBB

block.p: KELLER-Daniel Schubb. 53. Died of lung cancer August 10,2000 in NYC. He was born in Los Angeles but spent the past 20 years in NY working as a psychologist specializing in substance abuse research. He is survived by his beloved wife, Rebekah, daughter Anya, mother Shirley, sister Beth Jensen and brother John. Memorial service Sunday 10am at ''The Riverside'', 76th St. and Amsterdam Avenue.
